alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:13AM EST until January 11 at 11:12AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia... Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina...Virginia... Dan River Near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County. Dan River near Danville affecting Caswell, Pittsylvania, Rockingham and City of Danville independent cities. For the Dan River...including Wentworth, Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River near STP near Danville. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Flood water begins to affect the Danville Utilities Complex and the Public Works complex, * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:45 AM EST Wednesday was 21.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.1 feet on 11/14/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 215 PM EST.
